title: Did 20,000 fake IDs get caught at Chicago airport as part of the voters' scheme?
subtitle: The fraudulent driving permits seized by customs officials since early 2020 have become the subject of voting rumours.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: Thousands of counterfeit driver's licences smuggled from China and Hong Kong and confiscated at O'Hare Airport in Chicago since early 2020 were linked to voter fraud, and could produce millions of votes cast illegally in the United States general election in November 2020.
